channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - April 1, 2022
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-april-1-2022) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Back Again from the Broken Land_ * _CBR+PNK_ * _Corvid Court_ * _Delta Green_ * _Dream Aflame_ * _Dungeons & Dragons_ * _Godbound_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Monster of the Week_ * _Monsterhearts_ * _Punk's Been Dead Since '79_ * _Road Trip_ * _Spirit of '77_ * _Swoop Gangs_ * _The Great Soul Train Robbery_ * _Trophy Gold_ * _Uncharted Worlds_ * _Urban Shadows_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - April 1, 2022
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • Back Again from the Broken Land
  • CBR+PNK
  • Corvid Court
  • Delta Green
  • Dream Aflame
  • Dungeons & Dragons
  • Godbound
  • Hearts of Wulin
  • Monster of the Week
  • Monsterhearts
  • Punk’s Been Dead Since '79
  • Road Trip
  • Spirit of '77
  • Swoop Gangs
  • The Great Soul Train Robbery
  • Trophy Gold
  • Uncharted Worlds
  • Urban Shadows

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Calendar category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Calendar to play!
